content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: coarse_dirt
inventory=[{"type": "enchanted_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 2, "index": 16}, {"type": "blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 51, "index": 24}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 2, "index": 33}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 35, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft coarse_dirt, I need to place dirt and gravel side by side in the crafting table. Since I have two dirt in slot 33, I will first move one of them into slot 1 of the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1
